name: Slippy Evolution
description:
Slippy Evolution is a funny puzzle game of matching four creatures of the same kind.

Move four creatures of the same kind to the same place to make appear a new creature. Try to find as much different creatures as possible by using as few moves as necessary. The more creatures are on the board the more complicated it will be to bring the creatures together.

Of course you can compare your high scores in Game Center.

Icons provided free by EmojiOne.com
Sound effects provided by NoiseForFun.com
